input.sentences: there were a lot of people at the race today .
all of the riders had been training very hard for today .
they were very determined to win .
afterward i spent some time wandering the area .
output.sentences: It was the annual bicycling race event.
The cyclists had trained hard and some were very tired.
I noticed one cyclist who looked a little afraid as she saw the bike route.
But she was determined to finish the race.
At the end of the race, I was wandering around and found a view of the race that was intriguing.
